The TSN App gives Canadian sports fans the ability to live stream the network's five national feeds – TSN1, TSN2, TSN3, TSN4, and TSN5 – on multiple platforms, anytime, anywhere.

From the World Juniors to the Grey Cup, the FIFA World Cup to UEFA EURO, plus regional NHL broadcasts, Raptors and NBA to golf Majors and tennis Grand Slams, NFL, F1, NASCAR, UFC, NCAA and more. Download the TSN App and never miss a minute of Canada's Sports Leader's world-class lineup of live sports and 60+ championship events. Also, catch nightly editions of SportsCentre – Canada's most comprehensive sports news program – and access your favourite TSN shows alongside a slate of popular ESPN programming and much more!
The TSN App features breaking news headlines, up-to-the minute scores and stats, analysis and features from TSN's all-star roster of Insiders and experts. Along with wall-to-wall coverage of the NHL, NBA, CFL, NFL, MLS, MLB, ATP, PGA, F1, NASCAR, UFC, NCAA and every other major sports league, highlights of the TSN App include:
• Use of TSN 5G View requires a TSN subscription (either a direct subscription, or through a TV package) as well as a 5G device. The feature is available for all Leafs (regional), Habs (regional), and Raptors home games on TSN at no additional charge, though data charges may apply depending on a customer's service plan
• LIVE STREAMING: TSN subscribers can access live streaming of TSN1, TSN2, TSN3, TSN4, and TSN5, plus bonus coverage.
• ON-DEMAND VIEWING: Watch TSN's popular TV shows and live sports broadcasts on-demand.
• VIDEO HIGHLIGHTS & MORE: Don't miss a moment with the latest video highlights, stats, analysis, special features, and original content.
• CUSTOMIZABLE SCOREBOARD: Instantly access the score you want from your favourite leagues and teams.
• INDUSTRY LEADING NEWS & ANALYSIS: TSN's best-in-class team of Insiders and experts: Bob McKenzie, Darren Dreger, Pierre LeBrun, James Duthie, and many more.
• TSN RADIO & PODCASTS: Direct access to TSN-produced podcasts and live audio streaming of TSN Radio stations: Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, and Edmonton.
• TSN ORIGNIALS: Access to TSN's award-winning original features and documentaries.

The TSN App delivers a variety of all-new digital features for the FIFA WORLD CUP QATAR 2022™. These include:
• FIFA’s official Augmented Reality mode within the TSN app, giving fans the ability to stream every tournament match with augmented reality overlays, featuring up-to-the-moment player, team, and match insights as they happen
• All-new game pages for the tournament, with integrated live odds, team stats and head-to-head results
• An all-new game summary widget, with video highlights of key moments from each game
• An enhanced DVR feature, giving fans the ability to restart, pause, rewind, and fast-forward live game coverage as it happens
Tournament futures page, with up-to-date odds powered by FanDuel

iHunter is Canada's all in one hunting app for hunters in BC, Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Ontario, Quebec, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Yukon Territories. The app is free to download and each province is free to try for 3 days. Purchase is required after 3 days to continue using that province. 

Regulations are updated annually once released by the province.  

iHunter gives hunters a new view into their state or provinces hunting regulations. By overlaying the hunting zones on top of a range of different base maps, users can see their current location and which zone they are in. Dive deeper into specific zones to see which big game, predator, game bird and small game seasons are open. Add your own waypoints to keep track of hunting spots, past animal harvests, and landowner contact information.

Features (Most work offline):

• Includes season summary for the current year once it releases (works offline)
• View Hunting zones on top of your choice of map (boundaries display offline)
• 12 different base maps included, with 5 that can be cached for offline use
• Select hunting zone to view its summary of big-game, predator, game bird and small game seasons (works offline)
• Add waypoints to the map at your current location, known GPS locations, or where you tap on the map (works offline)
• Log in to back up and synchronize waypoints and preferences across devices
• Use the sunrise / sunset calculator to look up legal hunting light at your location or a waypoint location (works offline)
• Send your friends or family an email or text with your current location so they can easily find you (requires internet to send email)
• Display weather at your current location or at a waypoint location (requires internet to look up weather)
• Indian Reserve boundaries layer
• Import waypoints and tracks from .gpx files
• Track your position, speed and altitude, draw over the map, search the map, view most recently viewed and favorited items, add your own TMS and WMS map layers. Note: The location tracking feature uses the GPS on your device. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

CollX (pronounced “collects”) answers the question every collector has: “What’s it worth?” The app lets you scan any baseball, football, basketball, hockey, soccer, or wrestling card and instantly identify it and get the average market value. Once you’ve scanned your cards, add them to your collection and track your portfolio. Best of all, you can follow other users, message them, trade, buy and sell. 

COLLX CARD SCANNER	
CollX’s visual search technology instantly recognizes and matches against a database of 17+ million sports cards. After identifying the best match, you’ll immediately get the current average market price for the card. Our deep-learning models were created by a team with 10+ years experience developing image recognition for everyone from The Home Depot to Tommy Hilfiger to SnipSnap. In addition to being able to match most RAW cards, CollX will also identify graded cards with barcodes, as well as parallel and reprint versions of cards. 

GET HISTORICAL PRICING 
CollX uses millions of historical auction prices to calculate a card’s average value. As you add cards to your collection, you’ll see your overall portfolio value grow. Set conditions or grades on your cards and get more accurate prices. As your cards rise or fall in value, CollX helps you track both individual card values and your overall portfolio value. 

BUILD YOUR COLLECTION
Create and keep track of your collection. View your collection as a grid, list, or as sets. You can also filter and sort your cards by a variety of criteria — value, date added, year, team, etc. 

SEARCH CARDS
Search 17+ million cards in our database. See what cards on CollX are listed for sale right in search results. And if you find a card you own, but don’t have it handy to scan, you can easily add it from any of the records in the CollX database.

CONNECT WITH FRIENDS AND COLLECTORS
Connect your address book and CollX will show you who you know on the app. Follow other users by searching for them on the app’s universal search function and selecting the Users tab. Invite your friends to join and find out what their cards are worth!
